thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Upendra

author: Upendra
title: Upendra
text: I want to start a photography business and was looking for equipment and came upon Tomtop just by chance. Looked at the set up with lighting and umbrellas. This equipment was a good quality compared to equipment I bought a few days earlier. I have set up the equipment and have taken photos which look professional. I was not very happy with the bulbs supplied for the light, so I bought LED bulbs instead of supplied for a very reasonable price. I am very happy with the quality of the equipment. I will order from Tomtop again soon.
